name: Geo Morph
description:
Created by Petercraft and amymist for Ludum Dare 35, Theme: "Shapeshift."

To play, you must navigate the maze, watching out for traps and searching for the trapdoor that will take you further down. But beware! Unpleasant things may lurk below...

Controls---

Arrow keys to move

A-S Rotate shape

Z-X Rotate material

Space Select/Next
